summary: In this ticking clock action-thriller, a courier's last delivery of the day may also be the last day of his life. Strapped with explosives, he must fight for his life while trying to solve a mystery involving both his family and a criminal empire.
cast: Apostolis Totsikas|Tasos Nousias|Evgenia Dimitropoulou|Constantine Markoulakis|Thodoris Atheridis|Nikos Orfanos|Nikos Kouris|Irini Balta|Manos Gavras|Yorgos Karamihos|Giorgos Roustemis|Doretta Papadimitriou|Nikos Psarras|Yannis Rubus Rubulias|Konstantinos Sinetos|Kirilos Hioktouridis|Giorgos Galanis|Kelly Kaimaki|Thanos Kermitsis|Andreas Alexopoulos|Ilias Anastopoulos|Babis Bougas|Foivos Daskalakis|Kostas Dimopoulos|Nikos Georgakis|Dimitris Kalantzis|Christoforos Karras|Ioanna Kirolivanou|George Kordonis|Ares Kritikos|Lefteris Lesiotis|Andreas Malousaris|Giannis Malousaris|Georgia Markidi|Pantelis Nikolakopoulos|Panagiotis Nikolaou|Sotiris Ntouvas|Marios Pangkanikas|Takis Papafotopoulos|Kostas Priniotakis|Marios Raptis|Stathis Simeon|Andreas Stavropoulos|Maximos Tsamichas|Sotiris Tsatsos|Sofoklis Xenoudakis
title: Short Fuse
